Proclamation anent fourty-penny-pieces. Edinburgh 20. September 1699. Edinburgh (Scotland). Town Council. Home, George, Sir, of Kello.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty, city and colledge, Edinburgh : 1699.
Caption title. Signed: George Home. Arms of the city of Edinburgh at head of text. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
